CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 8, 1954, pg. 18, reads: "Ah! The Dance - Victor Hereford's creative dancers Fifth Avenue Annual Dance Revue, sponsored by Les Huits Amies, will be presented at the Irene Kaufmann Settlement House, May 13 and 14. Sitting, left to right, are Dolores Stewart, Juanita Baskin, Sylvia Davis and Yvonne Hershaw. Standing, left to right: Donna Drake, Calvin Jackson, Maxine Drake, James Satterwhite, Francis Hunter, Eddie Watson, Sammy Jones, Madelyn Green, Walter Mays, Betty Dunson, Billie Harper, Mamie Hamilton, Luther Sewell and Alberta Thompson. - Harris Photo. (Advt.)
TitMainTitle: Dancers from Victor Hereford Dance Revue in Caribbean-style costumes, including seated from left: Dolores Stewart, Juanita Baskin, Sylvia Davis, Yvonne Hershaw; standing: Donna Drake, Calvin Jackson, Maxine Drake, James Satterwhite, Francis Hunter, Eddie Watson, Sammy Jones, Madelyn Green, Walter Mays, Betty Dunson, Billie Harper, Mamie Hamilton, Luther Sewell and Alberta Thompson, posed in gymnasium
